vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the professional services contract with HDR Engineering, Inc. for additional engineering services required for water and wastewater relocations, additional storm drainage design, geotechnical engineering and survey work for the Nandina Pine Trail area, and additional design for King’s Branch culvert at Genoa - Not to exceed $130,049.68, from $897,753.10 to $1,027,802.78 - Financing: Flood Control (D) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($38,763.10), Water Capital Improvement G Fund ($43,817.56), and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($47,469.02)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the professional services contract with HDR Engineering, Inc. for additional engineering services required for water and wastewater relocations, additional storm drainage design, geotechnical engineering and survey work for the Nandina Pine Trail area, and additional design for King’s Branch culvert at Genoa - Not to exceed $130,049.68, from $897,753.10 to $1,027,802.78 - Financing: Flood Control (D) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($38,763.10), Water Capital Improvement G Fund ($43,817.56), and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($47,469.02)
